title: Effect of lateral-wedge insole on the center of foot pressure and lower extremity muscle activity at gait initiation in patients with medial knee osteoarthritis

affiliation.name: Department of Rehabilitation, Kyushu University of Nursing and Social Welfare: 888 Tominoo, Tamana-shi, Kumamoto 865-0062, Japan

2) Zhang W, Moskowitz RW, Nuki G, et al.: OARSI recommendations for the management of hip and knee osteoarthritis, Part II: OARSI evidence-based, expert consensus guidelines. Osteoarthritis Cartilage, 2008, 16: 137–162.

11) Freeman MA: Soft tissues: a question of balance. Orthopedics, 1997, 20: 827–831.
